mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_no,d.dept_name,p.position_name,e.password,e.emp_name,e.emp_tel,e.emp_sign FROM employee e, department d ,position p where e.dept_no=#{deptNo} and e.position_no=#{positionNo} and d.dept_no=e.dept_no and p.position_no=e.position_no
